memberdef.name: SAVE_CALLER_CONTEXT
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("addi sp, sp, %0" : : "i"(-CONTEXT_REG_NUM) :);\ __asm volatile("
\ c.swsp ra, 0*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t0, 1*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t1, 2*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t2, 3*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s0, 4*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s1, 5*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a0, 6*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a1, 7*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a2, 8*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a3, 9*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a4, 10*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a5, 11*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a6, 12*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a7, 13*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s2, 14*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s3, 15*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t3, 16*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t4, 17*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t5, 18*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t6, 19*4(sp)"); \ SAVE_FPU_CONTEXT(); \ }

briefdescription.para: Save the caller registers based on the RISC-V ABI specification.

memberdef.name: RESTORE_CALLER_CONTEXT
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ c.lwsp ra, 0*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t0, 1*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t1, 2*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t2, 3*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s0, 4*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s1, 5*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a0, 6*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a1, 7*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a2, 8*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a3, 9*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a4, 10*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a5, 11*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a6, 12*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a7, 13*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s2, 14*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s3, 15*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t3, 16*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t4, 17*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t5, 18*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t6, 19*4(sp) 
");\ RESTORE_FPU_CONTEXT(); \ __asm volatile("addi sp, sp, %0" : : "i"(CONTEXT_REG_NUM) :);\ }

briefdescription.para: Restore the caller registers based on the RISC-V ABI specification.

memberdef.name: ENTER_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ csrr s2, mepc 
\ csrr s3, mstatus 
");\ SAVE_FPU_STATE(); \ SAVE_DSP_CONTEXT(); \ __asm volatile("csrsi mstatus, 8"); \ }

memberdef.name: COMPLETE_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer: { \ __asm volatile("csrci mstatus, 8"); \ __asm volatile("lui a4, 0xe4200"); \ __asm volatile("li a3, %0" : : "i" (irq_num) :); \ __asm volatile("sw a3, 4(a4)"); \ }

memberdef.name: EXIT_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ csrw mstatus, s3 
\ csrw mepc, s2 
");\ RESTORE_FPU_STATE(); \ RESTORE_DSP_CONTEXT(); \ }

memberdef.name: NESTED_IRQ_ENTER
memberdef.initializer: SAVE_CSR(CSR_MEPC) \ SAVE_CSR(CSR_MSTATUS) \ SAVE_MXSTATUS() \ SAVE_FCSR() \ SAVE_UCODE() \ set_csr(CSR_MSTATUS, CSR_MSTATUS_MIE_MASK);

memberdef.name: SDK_DECLARE_EXT_ISR_M
memberdef.initializer:
void isr(void) __attribute__((section(".isr_vector")));\ HPM_EXTERN_C void ISR_NAME_M(irq_num)(void) __attribute__((section(".isr_vector")));\ void ISR_NAME_M(irq_num)(void) \ { \ SAVE_CALLER_CONTEXT(); \ ENTER_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M();\ __asm volatile("la t1, %0
	" : : "i" (isr) : );\ __asm volatile("jalr t1
");\ COMPLETE_IRQ_HANDLING_M(irq_num);\ EXIT_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M();\ RESTORE_CALLER_CONTEXT();\ __asm volatile("fence io, io");\ __asm volatile("mret
");\ }

briefdescription.para: Declare an external interrupt handler for machine mode.

memberdef.name: SDK_DECLARE_MCHTMR_ISR
memberdef.initializer: void isr(void) __attribute__((section(".isr_vector")));\ HPM_EXTERN_C void mchtmr_isr(void) __attribute__((section(".isr_vector"))); \ void mchtmr_isr(void) \ { \ isr();\ }

memberdef.name: SDK_DECLARE_SWI_ISR
memberdef.initializer: void isr(void) __attribute__((section(".isr_vector")));\ HPM_EXTERN_C void swi_isr(void) __attribute__((section(".isr_vector"))); \ void swi_isr(void) \ { \ isr();\ }

briefdescription.para: Disable global IRQ with mask and return mstatus.

parameterdescription.para: mstatus value before irq mask is disabled
Threshold of IRQ can be serviced

briefdescription.para: Install ISR for certain IRQ for ram based vector table.
Uninstall ISR for certain IRQ for ram based vector table.
